title: Connection error
body:
I continously disconnect from leagues chat, and like mid champ select it all freezes and tells me that there is an error and that i need to wait or exit league instead. Anyone know how to solve this or prevent it from happening. Ive dodged maybe 6 queues because of this problem.

Thank you all
Much Love

I2kmadboy
^^ add me aswell :D     {{champion:67}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
While we troubleshoot this, it'd be a good idea to back away from matchmaking queues to make sure you don't get any penalties or punishments from "dodging" so many games.

It does sound like you've been having a rough time keeping a solid connection with our servers so let's start by checking up on your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). Check out the steps in this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) paying close attention to how you can set up port forwarding and DNS options.
